
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/johnnyzen/p/18335324" title="发布于 2025-02-13 02:40">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">[虚拟化/Docker] Docker Desktop 安装与使用</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body cnblogs-markdown">
<h1 id="0-序deepseek-等ai大模型在windows的私有化部署">0 序：DeepSeek 等AI大模型在Windows的私有化部署</h1>
<ul>
<li>DeepSeek 等AI大模型在Windows的私有化部署，最流行的开源AI终端应用————Dify，依赖于 Docker 环境。由此，必然离不开：<code>Docker Desktop</code></li>
</ul>
<h1 id="1-概述docker-desktop">1 概述：<code>Docker Desktop</code></h1>
<ul>
<li><code>docker desktop</code> 是一款<code>Docker</code><strong>容器运行管理工具</strong>，用于在<strong>本地机器</strong>上运行 <code>docker</code> 容器。其使用方式包括：</li>
</ul>
<blockquote>
<ul>
<li>
<ol>
<li>安装 docker desktop；</li>
</ol>
</li>
<li>
<ol start="2">
<li>启动 docker desktop；</li>
</ol>
</li>
<li>
<ol start="3">
<li>创建 docker 镜像（可基于 <code>dockerfile</code>）；</li>
</ol>
</li>
<li>
<ol start="4">
<li>构建 docker 镜像（使用 <code>docker build</code>）；</li>
</ol>
</li>
<li>
<ol start="5">
<li>运行 docker 容器（使用 <code>docker run</code>）。</li>
</ol>
</li>
<li>...</li>
</ul>
</blockquote>
<h1 id="2-安装步骤">2 安装步骤</h1>
<h2 id="安装-on-windows">安装 on Windows</h2>
<h3 id="step1-安装-docker-desktop">Step1. 安装 Docker Desktop</h3>
<ul>
<li>Step1.1 下载安装包。</li>
</ul>
<blockquote>
<p>访问 Docker 官网，选择与您的操作系统匹配的安装包。按照安装说明进行操作。</p>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://www.docker.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://www.docker.com/</a></li>
<li><a href="https://www.docker.com/products/docker-desktop/" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://www.docker.com/products/docker-desktop/</a></li>
</ul>
</blockquote>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1173617/202412/1173617-20241231005601939-1408882817.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<blockquote>
<p>选择合适的安装包，并点击下载</p>
<blockquote>
<p><a href="https://desktop.docker.com/win/main/amd64/Docker%20Desktop%20Installer.exe" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://desktop.docker.com/win/main/amd64/Docker Desktop Installer.exe</a></p>
</blockquote>
</blockquote>
<ul>
<li>step1.2 点击安装包(<code>Docker Desktop Installer.exe</code>)，开始安装</li>
</ul>
<blockquote>
<p><code>4.36.0</code> (175267)</p>
</blockquote>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1173617/202412/1173617-20241231131315739-1530218828.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1173617/202412/1173617-20241231131305407-278515827.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1173617/202412/1173617-20241231133356195-1811509703.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<blockquote>
<p>默认的安装目录:</p>
</blockquote>
<pre><code class="language-log">C:\Program Files\Docker\
    cli-plugins\
        docker-ai.exe*
        docker-desktop.exe*
        docker-init.exe*
        docker-buildx.exe*
        docker-dev.exe*
        docker-sbom.exe*
        docker-compose.exe*
        docker-extension.exe*
        docker-scout.exe*
        docker-debug.exe*
        docker-feedback.exe*
    Docker\
        frontend\
            Docker Desktop.exe
            ...
        resources\
            bin\
                ...
            cli-plugins\
                ...
            wsl\
                ...
            com.docker.admin.exe
            com.docker.backend.exe
            com.docker.build.exe
            com.docker.dev-envs.exe
            com.docker.diagnose.exe
            Docker desktop.exe
            dockerd.exe
            docker-desktop.iso
            ...
        app.json
        Docker Desktop Installer.exe
        DockerCli.exe
        Docker Desktop.exe
        ...

C:\ProgramData\DockerDesktop\
    tmp-d4w\
        host.docker.internal (文件内容: 192.xxx.xxx.235)
    install-cli-log-admin.txt
    install-log-admin.txt
</code></pre>
<ul>
<li>为 docker 等程序配置环境变量</li>
</ul>
<pre><code class="language-shell">Path 环境变量-追加配置项: C:\Program Files\Docker\Docker\resources\bin
</code></pre>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1173617/202502/1173617-20250213023159217-255800046.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<ul>
<li>step1.3 重启电脑</li>
</ul>
<blockquote>
<p>重启后:</p>
</blockquote>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1173617/202501/1173617-20250101150458780-1255351765.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<blockquote>
<blockquote>
<p>Accept</p>
</blockquote>
</blockquote>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1173617/202501/1173617-20250101150532556-728908654.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<blockquote>
<blockquote>
<p>Finish</p>
</blockquote>
</blockquote>
<h3 id="step2-启动-docker-desktop">Step2. 启动 Docker Desktop</h3>
<p>安装后，从启动 Docker Desktop 应用程序。它将在您的托盘或菜单栏中运行。</p>
<blockquote>
<p>进入Docker Desktop主页，欢迎来到桌面版的Docker</p>
</blockquote>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1173617/202501/1173617-20250101150620036-272107122.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<blockquote>
<p>可以选择登录 Docker 账号，也可以选择不登录（我先选择不登陆）</p>
</blockquote>
<h3 id="step3-使用管理-docker-容器">Step3. 使用/管理 Docker 容器</h3>
<ul>
<li>推荐文献</li>
</ul>
<blockquote>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/johnnyzen/p/18088530" target="_blank">[docker] Dockerfile详解 - 博客园/千千寰宇</a></li>
<li><a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/johnnyzen/p/17785405.html" target="_blank">[Docker] Docker Compose 基础教程（概念/基础操作） - 博客园/千千寰宇</a></li>
<li><a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/johnnyzen/p/17439306.html" target="_blank">[Docker] Docker 基础教程（概念/原理/基础操作） - 博客园/千千寰宇</a></li>
</ul>
</blockquote>
<blockquote>
<p>提示</p>
<ul>
<li>使用 <code>docker run</code> 命令运行容器</li>
</ul>
<blockquote>
<ul>
<li><code>-it</code>：交互式终端</li>
<li><code>--rm</code>：容器退出后删除</li>
<li><code>--name</code>：为容器分配一个名称（可选）</li>
</ul>
</blockquote>
</blockquote>
<ul>
<li>使用 <code>docker ps</code> 查看正在运行的容器。</li>
</ul>
<pre><code class="language-shell">C:\Users\xxx&gt;docker ps
CONTAINER ID   IMAGE     COMMAND   CREATED   STATUS    PORTS     NAMES
</code></pre>
<ul>
<li>使用 <code>docker image list</code> 查看已构建的镜像。</li>
</ul>
<pre><code class="language-shell">C:\Users\xxx&gt;docker image list
REPOSITORY                  TAG        IMAGE ID       CREATED         SIZE
redis                       6-alpine   8d7a968b2baf   5 weeks ago     30.2MB
semitechnologies/weaviate   1.19.0     8ec9f084ab23   21 months ago   52.5MB
</code></pre>
<ul>
<li><code>docker info</code></li>
</ul>
<pre><code class="language-shell">C:\Users\xxx&gt; docker info
Client:
 Version:    25.0.3
 Context:    default
 Debug Mode: false
 Plugins:
  buildx: Docker Buildx (Docker Inc.)
    Version:  v0.12.1-desktop.4
    Path:     C:\Program Files\Docker\cli-plugins\docker-buildx.exe
  compose: Docker Compose (Docker Inc.)
    Version:  v2.24.6-desktop.1
    Path:     C:\Program Files\Docker\cli-plugins\docker-compose.exe
  debug: Get a shell into any image or container. (Docker Inc.)
    Version:  0.0.24
    Path:     C:\Program Files\Docker\cli-plugins\docker-debug.exe
  dev: Docker Dev Environments (Docker Inc.)
    Version:  v0.1.0
    Path:     C:\Program Files\Docker\cli-plugins\docker-dev.exe
  extension: Manages Docker extensions (Docker Inc.)
    Version:  v0.2.22
    Path:     C:\Program Files\Docker\cli-plugins\docker-extension.exe
  feedback: Provide feedback, right in your terminal! (Docker Inc.)
    Version:  v1.0.4
    Path:     C:\Program Files\Docker\cli-plugins\docker-feedback.exe
  init: Creates Docker-related starter files for your project (Docker Inc.)
    Version:  v1.0.1
    Path:     C:\Program Files\Docker\cli-plugins\docker-init.exe
  sbom: View the packaged-based Software Bill Of Materials (SBOM) for an image (Anchore Inc.)
    Version:  0.6.0
    Path:     C:\Program Files\Docker\cli-plugins\docker-sbom.exe
  scout: Docker Scout (Docker Inc.)
    Version:  v1.5.0
    Path:     C:\Program Files\Docker\cli-plugins\docker-scout.exe

Server:
 Containers: 0
  Running: 0
  Paused: 0
  Stopped: 0
 Images: 2
 Server Version: 25.0.3
 Storage Driver: overlay2
  Backing Filesystem: extfs
  Supports d_type: true
  Using metacopy: false
  Native Overlay Diff: true
  userxattr: false
 Logging Driver: json-file
 Cgroup Driver: cgroupfs
 Cgroup Version: 1
 Plugins:
  Volume: local
  Network: bridge host ipvlan macvlan null overlay
  Log: awslogs fluentd gcplogs gelf journald json-file local splunk syslog
 Swarm: inactive
 Runtimes: io.containerd.runc.v2 runc
 Default Runtime: runc
 Init Binary: docker-init
 containerd version: ae07eda36dd25f8a1b98dfbf587313b99c0190bb
 runc version: v1.1.12-0-g51d5e94
 init version: de40ad0
 Security Options:
</code></pre>
<ul>
<li>使用 <code>docker stop</code> 停止容器。</li>
<li>使用 <code>docker rm</code> 删除容器。</li>
<li>使用 <code>docker image rm</code> 删除镜像。</li>
</ul>
<h1 id="y-可选步骤注册登录-docker-账号">Y （可选步骤）注册/登录 Docker 账号</h1>
<ul>
<li>登录Docker账号，可创建和管理自己的镜像仓库Hub</li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1173617/202412/1173617-20241231005900926-1913253136.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h1 id="u-faq-安装-docker-desktop">U FAQ: 安装 Docker Desktop</h1>
<h2 id="q安装-docker-desktop-时报此访问控制列表格式不规范因此无法修改">Q:安装 Docker Desktop 时，报："此访问控制列表格式不规范，因此无法修改"</h2>
<ul>
<li>问题描述</li>
</ul>
<blockquote>
<p>点击 Docker Desktop 安装程序进行安装时，报："此访问控制列表格式不规范，因此无法修改"</p>
</blockquote>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1173617/202412/1173617-20241231131126054-1308211091.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1173617/202501/1173617-20250101154418237-1900797588.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<ul>
<li>解决方法</li>
</ul>
<blockquote>
<ul>
<li>step1 使用管理员权限，打开<code>cmd</code>命令提示符窗口。</li>
</ul>
</blockquote>
<blockquote>
<ul>
<li>step2 修复文件目录权限</li>
</ul>
</blockquote>
<pre><code class="language-cmd">icacls "C:\Program Files\Docker" /reset /t /c /q
icacls "C:\ProgramData\DockerDesktop" /reset /t /c /q
</code></pre>
<blockquote>
<blockquote>
<p>参数解释</p>
<ul>
<li>/reset：重置权限为默认值。</li>
<li>/t：递归地应用到所有子文件和子目录。</li>
<li>/c：继续执行，即使出现错误。</li>
<li>/q：静默模式，不显示成功消息。</li>
</ul>
</blockquote>
</blockquote>
<blockquote>
<p>执行完成执行，再次安装即可解决该问题。</p>
</blockquote>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1173617/202501/1173617-20250101154638960-88853298.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<ul>
<li>参考文献</li>
</ul>
<blockquote>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://download.csdn.net/blog/column/11479674/142408021" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">此访问控制列表格式不规范，因此无法修改 - CSDN</a></li>
</ul>
</blockquote>
<h2 id="q-docker-desktop-启动后面板显示docker-engine-stopped">Q: <code>Docker Desktop</code> 启动后，面板显示"Docker Engine Stopped"</h2>
<ul>
<li>问题描述</li>
</ul>
<blockquote>
<p><code>Docker Desktop</code> 启动后，面板显示"Docker Engine Stopped"</p>
</blockquote>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1173617/202501/1173617-20250101154959706-464905816.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<blockquote>
<p>如果你解决了访问<code>docker.com</code>的网络问题，打开<code>Docker Desktop</code>时，还会附带报："Docker Desktop - WSL update failed"</p>
</blockquote>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1173617/202501/1173617-20250101161034243-846406710.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<pre><code class="language-log">Docker Desktop - WSL update failed

An error occurred while updating WSL.

You can manually update using wsl --update.

If the issue persists, collect diagnostics and submit an issue

--------------------------------------

wsl update failed: update failed: updating wsl: exit code: 4294967295: running WSL command wsl.exe C:\Windows\System32\wsl.exe --update --web-download: �]�ybk(403)0

: exit status 0xffffffff
</code></pre>
<ul>
<li>解决方法</li>
</ul>
<blockquote>
<p>此处针对"Docker Engine Stopped"问题(不单单针对"Docker Desktop - WSL update failed"错误)的整个解决方法</p>
</blockquote>
<ul>
<li>参考文献</li>
</ul>
<blockquote>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://docs.docker.com/desktop/troubleshoot-and-support/support/#how-is-personal-diagnostic-data-handled-in-docker-desktop" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://docs.docker.com/desktop/troubleshoot-and-support/support/#how-is-personal-diagnostic-data-handled-in-docker-desktop</a></li>
</ul>
</blockquote>
<h2 id="q-解决win10家庭版找不到hyper-v的问题">Q: 解决Win10家庭版找不到<code>Hyper-V</code>的问题</h2>
<ul>
<li>问题描述</li>
</ul>
<blockquote>
<p><code>Windows 10</code><strong>家庭版</strong>在默认的“启用或关闭Windows功能”中<strong>不直接包含<code>Hyper-V</code>选项</strong>，但可以通过手动步骤来启用它。</p>
</blockquote>
<pre><code class="language-shell">control -&gt; 控制面板\程序\程序和功能 -&gt; 启用或关闭Windows功能 -&gt; Hyper-V (此选项，在 Windows 10 家庭版 中默认没有)
</code></pre>
<ul>
<li>Step1 检查电脑是否支持<code>Hyper-V</code></li>
</ul>
<blockquote>
<p>首先，确认电脑硬件是否支持<code>Hyper-V</code>功能。<br>
打开<code>Windows PowerShell</code> 或 CMD（以<strong>管理员身份</strong>运行）。</p>
</blockquote>
<p>输入 <code>systeminfo</code> 命令并回车。</p>
<blockquote>
<p>情况1：可能显示 "Hyper-V 要求:     已检测到虚拟机监控程序。将不显示 Hyper-V 所需的功能" （说明电脑支持Hyper-V）</p>
</blockquote>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1173617/202501/1173617-20250101155116690-1431994183.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<blockquote>
<p>情况2: 如果所有四个要求均显示为“是” （说明电脑支持Hyper-V）<br>
<img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1173617/202501/1173617-20250101155154868-1537781828.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
</blockquote>
<ul>
<li>Step2 准备启用Hyper-V的脚本</li>
</ul>
<blockquote>
<p>如果电脑支持Hyper-V，接下来需要准备一个脚本来启用它。</p>
</blockquote>
<p>新建一个文本文件，命名为<code>enable-hyperv.cmd</code>（或任何其他.cmd后缀的名称）。将以下代码复制并粘贴到该文件中：</p>
<pre><code class="language-shell">pushd "%~dp0"
 
dir /b %SystemRoot%\servicing\Packages\*Hyper-V*.mum &gt;hyper-v.txt
 
for /f %%i in ('findstr /i . hyper-v.txt 2^&gt;nul') do dism /online /norestart /add-package:"%SystemRoot%\servicing\Packages\%%i"
 
del hyper-v.txt
 
Dism /online /enable-feature /featurename:Microsoft-Hyper-V-All /LimitAccess /ALL
</code></pre>
<p>保存文件</p>
<ul>
<li>Step3 运行脚本以启用Hyper-V。找到<code>enable-hyperv.cmd</code>文件，右键点击该文件，选择“<strong>以管理员身份运行</strong>”。</li>
</ul>
<blockquote>
<p>等待脚本执行完成。脚本执行结束后，会提示<strong>重启计算机</strong>以使更改生效</p>
</blockquote>
<details>
    <summary>运行日志</summary>
<pre><code class="language-log">C:\Windows\system32&gt;pushd "C:\Users\XXX\Desktop\"

C:\Users\XXX\Desktop&gt;dir /b C:\Windows\servicing\Packages\*Hyper-V*.mum  1&gt;hyper-v.txt

C:\Users\XXX\Desktop&gt;for /F %i in ('findstr /i . hyper-v.txt 2&gt;nul') do dism /online /norestart /add-package:"C:\Windows\servicing\Packages\%i"

C:\Users\XXX\Desktop&gt;dism /online /norestart /add-package:"C:\Windows\servicing\Packages\Microsoft-Hyper-V-ClientEdition-Package~31bf3856ad364e35~amd64~zh-CN~10.0.19041.3758.mum"

部署映像服务和管理工具
版本: 10.0.19041.3636

映像版本: 10.0.19045.4170

正在处理 1 (共 1) - 正在添加程序包 Microsoft-Hyper-V-ClientEdition-Package~31bf3856ad364e35~amd64~zh-CN~10.0.19041.3758
[==========================100.0%==========================]
操作成功完成。

C:\Users\XXX\Desktop&gt;dism /online /norestart /add-package:"C:\Windows\servicing\Packages\Microsoft-Hyper-V-ClientEdition-Package~31bf3856ad364e35~amd64~~10.0.19041.4170.mum"

部署映像服务和管理工具
版本: 10.0.19041.3636

映像版本: 10.0.19045.4170

正在处理 1 (共 1) - 正在添加程序包 Microsoft-Hyper-V-ClientEdition-Package~31bf3856ad364e35~amd64~~10.0.19041.4170
[==========================100.0%==========================]
操作成功完成。

C:\Users\XXX\Desktop&gt;dism /online /norestart /add-package:"C:\Windows\servicing\Packages\Microsoft-Hyper-V-ClientEdition-WOW64-Package~31bf3856ad364e35~amd64~zh-CN~10.0.19041.1.mum"

部署映像服务和管理工具
版本: 10.0.19041.3636

映像版本: 10.0.19045.4170

正在处理 1 (共 1) - 正在添加程序包 Microsoft-Hyper-V-ClientEdition-WOW64-Package~31bf3856ad364e35~amd64~zh-CN~10.0.19041.1
[==========================100.0%==========================]
操作成功完成。

C:\Users\XXX\Desktop&gt;dism /online /norestart /add-package:"C:\Windows\servicing\Packages\Microsoft-Hyper-V-ClientEdition-WOW64-Package~31bf3856ad364e35~amd64~~10.0.19041.1.mum"

部署映像服务和管理工具
版本: 10.0.19041.3636

映像版本: 10.0.19045.4170

正在处理 1 (共 1) - 正在添加程序包 Microsoft-Hyper-V-ClientEdition-WOW64-Package~31bf3856ad364e35~amd64~~10.0.19041.1
[==========================100.0%==========================]
操作成功完成。

C:\Users\XXX\Desktop&gt;dism /online /norestart /add-package:"C:\Windows\servicing\Packages\Microsoft-Hyper-V-Hypervisor-merged-Package~31bf3856ad364e35~amd64~zh-CN~10.0.19041.1.mum"

部署映像服务和管理工具
版本: 10.0.19041.3636

映像版本: 10.0.19045.4170

正在处理 1 (共 1) - 正在添加程序包 Microsoft-Hyper-V-Hypervisor-merged-Package~31bf3856ad364e35~amd64~zh-CN~10.0.19041.1
[==========================100.0%==========================]
操作成功完成。

C:\Users\XXX\Desktop&gt;dism /online /norestart /add-package:"C:\Windows\servicing\Packages\Microsoft-Hyper-V-Hypervisor-merged-Package~31bf3856ad364e35~amd64~~10.0.19041.1.mum"

部署映像服务和管理工具
版本: 10.0.19041.3636

映像版本: 10.0.19045.4170

正在处理 1 (共 1) - 正在添加程序包 Microsoft-Hyper-V-Hypervisor-merged-Package~31bf3856ad364e35~amd64~~10.0.19041.1
[==========================100.0%==========================]

[==========================100.0%==========================]
操作成功完成。

C:\Users\XXX\Desktop&gt;del hyper-v.txt

C:\Users\XXX\Desktop&gt;Dism /online /enable-feature /featurename:Microsoft-Hyper-V-All /LimitAccess /ALL

部署映像服务和管理工具
版本: 10.0.19041.3636

映像版本: 10.0.19045.4170

启用一个或多个功能
[==========================100.0%==========================]
操作成功完成。
重新启动 Windows 以完成该操作。
是否立即重新启动计算机? (Y/N)Y
</code></pre>
</details>
<ul>
<li>Step4 重启计算机后，再次查看，即出现了<code>Hyper-V</code>选项</li>
</ul>
<pre><code class="language-shell">control(控制面板) -&gt; 控制面板\程序\程序和功能 -&gt; 启用或关闭Windows功能 -&gt; Hyper-V (选项出现)
</code></pre>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1173617/202501/1173617-20250101155612746-1987829463.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<ul>
<li>参考文献</li>
</ul>
<blockquote>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://blog.csdn.net/weixin_41870042/article/details/140712373" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">解决win10家庭版找不到Hyper-V的问题 - CSDN</a></li>
</ul>
</blockquote>
<h2 id="q-启动-dockerdesktop-服务的方式">Q: 启动 DockerDesktop 服务的方式</h2>
<ul>
<li>方式1: 从 <code>services.msc</code> 手动启动<code>Docker Desktop Service</code></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1173617/202502/1173617-20250213024702793-998554517.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 id="q-docker-desktop-为-docker-engine-配置-docker-镜像源">Q: Docker Desktop 为 Docker Engine 配置 Docker 镜像源</h2>
<ul>
<li>推荐文献</li>
</ul>
<blockquote>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/johnnyzen/p/17439306.html#_lab2_5_1" target="_blank">[Docker] Docker 基础教程（概念/原理/基础操作）－　博客园／千千寰宇</a></li>
</ul>
<blockquote>
<p>Docker Hub 镜像加速器列表</p>
</blockquote>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://blog.csdn.net/m0_48335178/article/details/137588842" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">Docker桌面版配置镜像源（纯小白版） - CSDN</a></li>
</ul>
</blockquote>
<ul>
<li>Docker Desktop 中配置 Docker 镜像源，本质 = 修改 json 配置文件</li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1173617/202502/1173617-20250213015241343-1890104509.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1173617/202502/1173617-20250213014923103-348715239.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<ul>
<li>应用并重启</li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1173617/202502/1173617-20250213015320629-470463251.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<ul>
<li>测试是否配置成功</li>
</ul>
<blockquote>
<ul>
<li>Windows PowerShell</li>
</ul>
</blockquote>
<pre><code class="language-shell">docker info
</code></pre>
<blockquote>
<blockquote>
<p>在输出中寻找 <code>Registry Mirrors</code>，看到刚刚输入的镜像地址即配置成功</p>
</blockquote>
</blockquote>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1173617/202502/1173617-20250213015933530-1905525763.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h1 id="y-推荐文献">Y 推荐文献</h1>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/johnnyzen/p/18646495" target="_blank">[Windows/虚拟化/OS] WSL(Windows Subsystem for Linux)技术 - 博客园/千千寰宇</a></li>
<li><a href="https://blog.csdn.net/qq_49035156/article/details/143264534" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">从零开始！在 Windows 上安装与配置 Dify - CSDN</a></li>
</ul>
<h1 id="x-参考文献">X 参考文献</h1>
<ul>
<li>第三方网站 :</li>
</ul>
<blockquote>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://docker.github.net.cn/get-docker/" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://docker.github.net.cn/get-docker/</a></li>
</ul>
</blockquote>
<ul>
<li>
<p><a href="https://blog.csdn.net/qq_42567701/article/details/142414252" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">【Docker基础】Docker Desktop入门使用指南 - CSDN</a></p>
</li>
<li>
<p><a href="https://www.php.cn/faq/818710.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">docker desktop怎么用 - php中文网</a></p>
</li>
<li>
<p><a href="https://blog.csdn.net/weixin_67276852/article/details/139691781" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">Windows 11 中安装 Docker Desktop 并安装镜像 - CSDN</a></p>
</li>
<li>
<p><a href="https://blog.csdn.net/cxr828/article/details/145031595" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">Docker Desktop的使用方法 - CSDN</a></p>
</li>
</ul>
